concept.title: How to share a file in Microsoft Teams
concept.shortdesc: Here you will learn how to share a file in Microsoft Teams.

conbody.p: Sometimes words aren't enough, and you need to post a file to a channel conversation.

li.p: In your channel conversation, click Attach under the box where you type your message.

ol.li:
Select from these options:
Recent
Browse Teams and Channels
OneDrive
Upload from my computer
Select a file > Share a link.
If you're uploading a file from your computer, select a file, click Open, and then Send .
